SELECT B.*, u.name AS realName, u.username AS username FROM DASH_DATASOURCE B LEFT JOIN DASH_ADMIN_USER u ON u.user_id = B.user_id
WHERE #{userId} = '${admin_user_id}' OR B.user_id = #{userId} OR datasource_id IN ( SELECT res_id FROM DASH_ADMIN_USER_ROLE ur LEFT JOIN DASH_ADMIN_ROLE_RES rr ON ur.role_id = rr.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND rr.res_type = 'datasource' )
WHERE #{adminId} = '${admin_user_id}' OR B.user_id = #{adminId} OR datasource_id IN ( SELECT res_id FROM DASH_ADMIN_ROLE r LEFT JOIN DASH_ADMIN_ROLE_RES rr ON r.role_id = rr.role_id WHERE r.user_id = #{adminId} AND rr.res_type = 'datasource' )
ORDER BY B.name
